Checkup.intro:
Preventive Checkup

You can also fill out a more elaborate survey.
Checkup.title: Checkup

form.title: Preventive Checkup Form
form.intro: With a completed survey, the online consultation with the drd family doctor can be even more effective.
form.q1: I have trouble seeing clearly (despite glasses or contact lenses).
form.q2: I need strong glasses or contact lenses to see far distances.
form.q3: I have a first degree relative (parent, sibling or child) with glaucoma.
form.q4: (above 65:) My vision is not being checked regularly.
form.q5: I was told that I have diabetes (not during pregnancy).
form.q6: I am being treated for diabetes.
form.q7: I have a blood relative with diabetes.
form.q8: (women:) During pregnancy, I was told to have diabetes.
form.q9: I have a parent or sibling (under the age of 60) who has a heart condition or died thereof.
form.q10: I have a blood relation with high cholesterole.
form.q11: I have experienced a heart attack or stroke, or I was told that I suffer from circulatory disorders of the coronary arteries.
form.q12: I smoke {count, plural, =0{no cigarettes} one{one cigarette per day} other{# cigarettes per day}}.
form.q12Unknown: I smoke (not specified) cigarettes per day.
form.q13: I have high blood pressure (above 140 / 90) or I am taking medication against hypertension.
form.q15: In the last two weeks, I have taken medication against pain (Aspirin or similar).
form.q16: In the last two weeks, I have taken tranquilizers (Valium or similar).
form.q17: In the last two weeks, I have taken sleeping pills.
form.q18: How often do you consume alcohol?
form.q19: Do your gums bleed when you brush your teeth or eat solid food, or do your gums feel swollen or sensitive?
form.q20: Have your gums receded? Do you think, your seem to have gotten longer, or the distance between them bigger?
form.q21: If you have a partial denture, has the fit changed?
form.q22: Do you have problems with bad breath?
form.acuteQuestion: During the last two months I had (or have) the following diseases:
form.q27: Infection of kidneys or urinary tract
form.acuteList: Please update any further acute illnesses.
form.chronicQuestion: Do you have or did you have any of these chronic diseases?
form.q35: Chronic respiratory disease (asthma, shortness of breath, emphysema, chronic cough)
form.chronicList: Please update any further chronic diseases in the anamnesis section.
form.surgeriesList: Please list any surgeries you have undergone.
form.q43: I have a blood relative who had breast cancer.
form.q44: I have a first degree relative (parent, sibling or child) who had skin cancer (melanoma).
form.q45: I have a first degree relative (parent, sibling or child) who had any kind of cancer (lung, colon, blood, prostate or uterus).
form.whichRelative: If yes, which first degree relative?
form.whichCancer: If yes, what kind of cancer?
form.updateViaAnamnesis: Please complete the body measurement information in the anmnesis section.

answer.weekly: Two or three times a week
answer.daily: Four times a week or more

export.message: This survey can be exported as a PDF document.

InfoPage.heading: Why health data is so important
InfoPage.para1: Accurate information about the health state of a patient is the basis for a doctor to make an accurate diagnosis. This app will hellp you gather the basic data that you can use at your next doctor's visit.
InfoPage.para2: drd doctors online is a company in tele-medicine that allows you to talk to your drd family doctor via video chat, keep a tab on all your medical records and contact any resident doctor in Austria.
InfoPage.title: Information
InfoPage.para3: You can also export the data of your anamnesis.

android.para1: You can capture your health data in this app to use them later on our plattform web.drd.at.

InfoPage.feature1: Consultation with a drd family doctor via video chat
InfoPage.feature2: Electronic health records: simple and secure
InfoPage.feature3: Doctor search: contact specialists and general practitioners in Austria

DoctorsPage.title: Doctors
DoctorsPage.para1: It is important to find the right doctor for your condition. drd doctors online has a comprehensive search to find just the right specialist in your neighborhood.
DoctorsPage.para2: But sometimes it is equally important to get to a doctor right away, ideally without any travel or waiting time. drd doctors online provides this service for selected customers.
DoctorsPage.para3: Before a consultation you should have completed your anamnesis.

android.para1: You can create your profile in the web app of drd doctors online, or you can simply log in there if you already have a profile.
android.para2: Then you can upload the data of your anmnesis simply with a PIN which you can find on the profile page in the drd app.
android.haveProfileLabel: Yes, I already have a profile.

DoctorsPage.howto: How do I get to a physician?
DoctorsPage.getToDoctor: drd doctors online is available during usual business hours online.
DoctorsPage.enterCode: Please enter your upload PIN here.
DoctorsPage.codeExplain: You can find your PIN on the drd platform in the ‚ÄùAnamnesis‚Äù section.
DoctorsPage.profileSwitchLabel: Yes, I already have a profile..

info.title: Free Doctor Search
info.intro: The Doctor Search by drd is unique in Austria: here you can find the suitable specialist among the country's registered established medical professionals finden, along with all important information.
info.searchTips: You can search for name, address or speicalty, even partially. For example,
info.example: will search for all dentists in Vienna's first district.

pin.notValid: The entered PIN code was not found.

walkThrough.title: Medical advice comfortably via App

bulletPoints.1: Video consultations with real doctors instantly
bulletPoints.3: Your personal health file for medical documents

walkThrough.conclusion: Take a short tour to explore all features and benefits.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: Confidential video calls with real doctors at the push of a button.

bulletPoints.3: Office hours currently: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Monday through Friday, including holidays

docs.title: Receive & Redeem Medical Docs
docs.description: After talking to one of our GPs get Prescriptions (redeemable at all Austrian pharmacies).

bulletPoints.1: Your own digital vault for your medical data
bulletPoints.2: Safely upload and store your documents
bulletPoints.3: Documents cna be downloaded and printed
bulletPoints.4: You decide about sharing the documents with doctors

bulletPoints.1: Access to all residing Austrian specialists
bulletPoints.2: Various search options such as specialisation or location
bulletPoints.3: Book an appointment and get to know new doctors
bulletPoints.4: Take the next step for your treatment

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: The safety and confidentiality of your health data is pivotal to us!

bulletPoints.1: drd doctors online does not sell your data.
bulletPoints.2: Your health data are end-to-end encrypted
bulletPoints.3: Only you decide whom you share your health data with
bulletPoints.4: All our servers are located in the DACH region (Germany, Austria, Switzerland)

footerText: In cooperation with Drei and Generali
